summary: Adds the entity to the collection of registered entities on a [Layer](/documentation/Layer).

parameters.name: layer
parameters.description: The [Layer](/documentation/Layer) to add the entity to.

remarks: Adding an entity to a layer using this method will also set the [layer](/documentation/Entity/properties/layer) property.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
